Description: Configuration error detected: InvalidBiSS encoder parameter settingParameter _SigLatched Bit 22
Cause: Incorrect values in parametersENCDigBISSResSgl orENCDigBISSResMult.

Description: BiSS encoder bits 'War' or 'Err' aresetParameter _WarnLatched Bit 22
Cause: The bits are used for diverse types ofmonitoring such as:- Encoder temperature is too high.- Service life of LED inside encoderexceeded.- Position is not reliable.

Description: BiSS initialization error detectedParameter _SigLatched Bit 22
System error detected: Timeoutduring connection to power stageParameter _SigLatched Bit 31
Correctives: Contact your Schneider Electricservice representative.

Description: System error detected: Invalid datareceived from power stageParameter _SigLatched Bit 31
Correctives: Contact your Schneider Electricservice representative.

Description: System error detected: Dataexchange with power stage lostParameter _SigLatched Bit 31
Correctives: Contact your Schneider Electricservice representative.

Description: System error detected: Exchange ofidentification data from power stagenot successfulParameter _SigLatched Bit 31
Correctives: Contact your Schneider Electricservice representative.

Description: System error detected: Checksumidentification data from power stageincorrectParameter _SigLatched Bit 31
Correctives: Contact your Schneider Electricservice representative.

Description: System error detected: Noidentification frame received frompower stageParameter _SigLatched Bit 31
Correctives: Contact your Schneider Electricservice representative.

Description: System error detected: Type ofpower stage and manufacture datado not match
